channel.title: Noobie question - directing CC input to a knob?
channel.description: EDIT: SOLVED - I could just patch from the midi CC input directly, I didnt have to modify the grain size knob module. Hi there. I am a new Axoloti owner, and fairly new to programming (fairly basic reaktor is as deep as I have gone). I want to modify Grain-Mill-Axocontrol so that I can control the patch with midi CC instead of the Axocontrol. The midi/in/cc tool is reciving midi cc (midi channel 5, CC1). I know this from the midi monitor, and have tested by modulating pitch of an osc. However I am not sure how to configure the knob patcher in Grain-Mill-Axocontrol to recieve CC instead of the Axocontrol's input. Can anyone help? See the diagram below. I have tried patching midi/in/cc into kfliter/lowpadd and into math/+ and nothing happens. Thanks!

item.title: Noobie question - directing CC input to a knob?
item.dc:creator: @NamedUser
item.description:
@NamedUser wrote:

EDIT: SOLVED - I could just patch from the midi CC input directly, I didnt have to modify the grain size knob module.

Hi there. I am a new Axoloti owner, and fairly new to programming (fairly basic reaktor is as deep as I have gone).

I want to modify Grain-Mill-Axocontrol so that I can control the patch with midi CC instead of the Axocontrol. The midi/in/cc tool is reciving midi cc (midi channel 5, CC1). I know this from the midi monitor, and have tested by modulating pitch of an osc.

However I am not sure how to configure the knob patcher in Grain-Mill-Axocontrol to recieve CC instead of the Axocontrol's input.

Can anyone help? See the diagram below. I have tried patching midi/in/cc into kfliter/lowpadd and into math/+ and nothing happens.

Screen Shot 2019-07-02 at 11.13.08 AM.png699x536 24 KB

Thanks!

Read full topic
